description: Each row represents a respondent's ranking of their top 3 UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) for Tehri, India.
This is a transformation table to integrate SDG labelling across the two survey datasets.
Each row represents one respondent in either the survey undertaken in Tehri or the survey undertaken in Arunachale Pradesh.
Long format of top 3 SDG rankings from Arunachal Pradesh respondents.
Each row a ranking of top 3 SDG priorities, by one respondent from either the Tehri or Arunachal survey. In particular this step ensures that the SDG labels are harmonised across the two surveys.

Raw data from survey in Tehri, collected by Dr Garima Gupta. Each row represents the survey responses of a single respondent. This step loads the data into the pipeline and establishes an identifier for each respondent. See `raw_data/tehri_cols.md` for details on all questions included in this dataset.

Raw data from survey in Arunachal Pradesh, collected by Dr Garima Gupta. Each row represents the survey responses of a single respondent. This step loads the data into the pipeline and establishes an identifier for each respondent. Only top 5 ranking and age and gender in these data, an extraction from the full arunachal dataset which is not available due to institutional restrictions. For this pipeline the top 3 rankings are extracted for analysis.

Each row represents a respondent's ranking of their top 3 UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) for Tehri, India. These data are extracted in wide format from the original survey data preserving labelling for data validation.

Each row represents a respondent's ranking top 3 UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) for Arunachal Pradesh, India. These data are extracted in wide format from the original survey data preserving labelling for data validation.
Each row represents a respondent from Arunachal Pradesh.
Each row represents a respondent from Tehri.
Top 3 analytical model for key metrics
Cleaned and transformed respondents data for analysis.
UN SDG labels and numbers as identifiers.
Dataset reporting if SDG 7 was prioritised in top 3 ranking by respondents, with respondent metadata.
